name: 劉恩英
objective:
本課程使學生具有基礎韓語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Korean abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Korean language.
schedule:
1. 每課有主要單字與句型。
2. 每個星期將會有一篇主題閱讀與說話。
Focus on the application of patterns, and build the students’ abilities of listening and speaking in Korean. 
1. Each lesson has a dictation of main patterns.
2. Each will have a reading topic to speaking.
